title: Search for the Strangler: My Hunt for Boston's Most Notorious Killer
description: Originally published as "A Rose for Mary," this account by the nephew of the so-called Boston Strangler's last victim details his ten-year quest to find the real killer of 13 women in the early 1960s, and describes an unlikely alliance with the family of self-confessed murderer Albert DeSalvo. photos.
author: Casey Sherman
